page.title: 19Garden Centres
page.content: There are several Garden Centres and plant nurseries in our area. They open 7 days a week to cater for increased public demand. A particularly successful one is Barnett Hill Garden Centre owned by Mr and Mrs Wrighton. They bought the 20 acre rough hillside fields site in 1969, put up a hut and started the business. Today the area is attractively landscaped and well-labelled selling plants and shrubs for particular places. There is also an aquatic centre stocking pools, fish and related products and also a section selling building materials and garden furniture. A large covered area offers everything from potted plants to lawnmowers and weedkillers to books and cards. Part of the site is franchised to firms including a craft centre, restaurant and stone mason.
